div.p:
Curia Balliuorum Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo quarto quinto die
mensis marcij Anno quo supra

The said day thir personis vnder writin that is to say the wif of Robert piper the
wif of Williame still the wif of georg barbour the wif of Johne ramsay marga
ret litstar the wedew of Johnne stevinsone eldar katherin wrquhard the wif of Johne'
of murray the wif of James strathachin the wif of thome Riddaill the seruand
of gilbert litstar the wif of alexander malisone the wif of mathoue branche the
wif of Alexander horne the wif of Willeame colp Canny Waus the wif of
Williame belty the wif of Rob fleschear the wif of Androw michelsone the videw
of Richerd' Waus the wif of Johnne piper the wif of alexander blair the
wif of patry Reid' the wif of cristy prat the wif og Androu lousone the wif
of alexander burnat and the wif of Willeame rollande was in amerciament
of the court be thar avin tong frant ilkan of thaim accusit singularly be thaim
self for the brekin of common' ordinance in the brewing and Selling of xij d'
aill aganis the akis and statutis maid tharapone and brekin of common ordinance And' till amend' as law
will and forbeir in tyme tocum

The said day the prouoist and baillies with a part of the counsaill present
for the tyme assignit and gef the amerciamentis and vnlawis of the
broustaris befor writin to the reperacioun and biggin of thar common' key and
peir And the said vnlawis being modefeit and set be the prouoist and
baillies thai ordand the four officiaris to pas' to pund' compell and
distrenye for the said amerciamentis and Inbring and make pament tharof
to the denys of the gild' euery officiar in his avin quartar

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the prouoist baillies and part
of the counsaill present for the tyme for the commone profit of the towne that
na broustaris suld brew nor sell aill derrar thane viij d' the galloun'
quhill michelmes nixt hereftir And gif ony persone brewis and sellis aill derrar
thane viij d' the gallon' and beis conuict tharof sall pay the haill amerciament
of the court vnforgevin Ande the broust to be delt amang the pur' folkis
and thar caldrounis bodomys or leiddis to the be brough' to the merkat cors' and
strikin furtht and thai to be secludit fra the excercioun' of brevin for ane
yeir

The said day the wif of Richerd' Wricht grantit hir awand' to Johnne'
flessour xx d' quhilkis the baillies chargeit hir to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo sexto die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The said' day thir personis caik bakaris mege Downy Canny meldrum Isabele
hammyltone Elspat bogy marioun' Kintor Canny Club the wif of Johne
fynne Ellok sclatar and Kitty Westland' was conuict be ane Suorne assis'
for Spilling of the mercat in bying of meile and gevin and making
nay price to the skatht and dampning of the toune for the quhilkis Ilkan of tham was
in amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amende as law wile and forbeir' in tyme to cum
Item the said personis Ande thir personis eftire writin that is to say the wif of Johne
talyour the wif of Jonhne Wricht the widew of Androw beltar margaret fechat
meg howat meg mvsky marione Kay and margaret Kay was conuict'
for bakin of cakis nocht correspondeing to the price of the meile to gret preiudice
of puir' folkis and contrar' the Statutis of the toune for the quhilkis Ilkan of
thame was in Amerciament of the court and tile amende as law wile and forber'
in tyme to cum

The said day marione Anthone the wif of Jonhne flessour mage
stiklar the wif of Robert govne the wif of Alexander talyour the
wif of Jonhne Scot and maly was be thar' avne toung graunt
Ilkan of tham was in Amerciament of the court for

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoseptimo
die mensis marcij anno quo supra

The said day the prouest and bailyeis assignit monunday that nixt cumis to patry
rede to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be alexander Kintor that he aucht
to releif and warand' him skaithtles of his part of the skatht of Symone ello
nis sak of woll castin furtht of the bargh' as he that oblist him tharto

The said day the prouest and bailyes assignit this day xv dais the last day
of merche Instant' to patry red to ansuer to the borgh' fundin on him
be alexander hay for the wranguis' intrometting witht ane pennvkile of skyn
nis of his in the schip of this toun' and throue the intrometting of thame that
he wantis x vxx skynnis and x skynnis and vj selk skynnis et cetera

The said day the prouost and baillies ordanit the officiaris William Scrimgeour to
warne James bervy or his wif to compeir on' monunday that nixt cummys to
heir the witnes and preiffis led' be Ellon' scot the wif of henry bawne suorne
anent the awaill of ane haik with the quhilkis the said James bervyis wif
Intromettit with

The said the prouest and baillies assignit this day viij dais to Symone ellon'
and alexander his forspekar till oppin the deposiciounis of the witnes producit be
thame anent the awaill of the Sak of woll et cetera warnit patry Reid' mathou
branch Johnne crail and vthiris thar complicis to heir the said deposicionis oppinnit

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' James collison' forspekar
that Johnne of meldrum sall deliuer ane half netht to Johnne of mar baillie
als gud as quhen scho come out of the wattir And' gif scho be bettir than
the said Johnne of meldrum fand the said Johnn' of mar sall recompens' him again
quhat scho is bettir than he gat hir And gif scho be war than quhen the said John
meldrum Intromettit with hir se sall mak hir als sufficient and gud agane
be the sicht of suorne personis

The said day Androw skynner in his wiffis nayme' was in amerciament of
the court be ane suorne assis' James collisone forspekar for the strublance
of Will colly skynner and' till amend as law will and forber' in tyme
tocum And atour the assis' ordand' that the said Androw suld hald' na swyn' vppoun'
the said Willeame to do hyme ony skath

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo secundo die
mensis marcij Anno et cetera quingentesimo septimo

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem curie quod thomas
chamer filius promogenitus quondam thome chamer burgensis dicti burgj est legittimus
et propinquior heres dictj quondam thome patris suj Et quod est legittime etatis Igitur
datus fuit in mandatis Johannj mar vnj balliuorum eiusdem burgj ad cognoscendum
ipsum thomam ad terram sine tenementum Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum
ex orientali parte eiusdem inter terram gilbert menyeis prepositi ex australi parte ex
et terra heredum quondam Richardj Kintor ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias re
gias versus oriens et occidens

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoquarto die
mensis marcij Anno quo supra

The said day the Alderman and baillies continewit the opnyng of the deposicionis
of the witnes of the sek of woll pertening to Syme of Ellone to this day xv dais
without ony preiudice / And' that day the deposicionis of the said witnes to be opinnit
and thai to gif thar decreit tharapone

The said day comperit Alexander gray forspekar for Syme of Elloun'
and protestit for costis skathis Dampnis and expensis that the said Symon sustenit
throu the continuacioun' of the opnyng of the deposicionis of the said witnes
And' dissasentit till ony continuacioun' tharof

The said day the Alderman and baillies commandit and chargit ormond'
leslie officiar to lay wand' on Johnne of meldrum and charg him
to Remain within the tolbutht vnto the tyme he fulfillit the Act' of the
buk gane abefor betuix him and Johnne' of mar' bailye anent
ane hald netht quhil suld' be deliuerit to the said Johnne' lik as in
the said ak mair fullelie is contenit

The said day the prouoist and bailyeis contenvit the the takin of the deposicionis
of the witnes betuix James collisone and Androw murray to monunday that nixt
cummys / becaus Willeame portar bailye allegit on' the said Androwis behald that
he wald' refer that mater to the said James deposicioun'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij xxvij die mensis marcij anno
Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Octauo

The said' day It was fundin and lauchfullie preuit that Androw murray restis
aving to James Colisone ane boll of malt and vij s' siluer of the
rest of the tend' wittale of Schethoisley for the quhilk Dauid murray
his Sone Come Souerte to halde ferme and stabile for his fadir and tharfor the officiar'
Williame Scrimgeor at commavnde of the prouest and balyeis chargit the saide
Dauid to pay the said boll of malt and vij s' of Siluer to the said James
within terme of law

The saide day Androw nachtj officiar' preuit that he warnit Jonet Srathachin to cum
to the tolbutht to her' personis vnsuspect Suorne to pris' the keche of
the lande quhar' Alexander moresone duellis and se and considir quhat wile big
and reforme It eftir the tenour of the Reuersione maide tharapon'

The said' day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' James
Colysone forspekar that Jonhne low is aving to Dauid Andirsone xxiiij s'
and x d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay to him within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die marcij
anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Octauo

The said' day the prouest ande balyeis asignit this day viij dais to patry Rede
and Jonhne Crail tile ansuer' to the borgh' fundin one thame be Alexander hay
contenit in the last act obefor peremptourlie with consent of batht the saide partijs

The saide day the prouest ande balyeis assignit this day xv dais tile Alexander
burnat tile Alexander to the borghe' fundin one him be henry andirsone for the
non resauing of tua dakir of hidis bocht fra him quhilkis fra him and aw to
resaue thame and pay to him fiwe pundis and xiiij s' except' ane Inglis grotis
resuit in part of pament of the saide Some

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio Eiusdem tercio
die mensis aprilis Anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene tercio die mensis aprilis anno Domini
millesimo quingentesimo Octauo Coram honorabilibus virum gilberto menyeis preposito
Dauid mar et Willelmo portar duobus balliuorum dicti burgi de Abirdene in
pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti per subscripti videlicet Johanne lesly de
Warderi Johanne cullane thomam chamer de quyltis Johanne colisone
Dauid andersone Jacobum colisone thomam leslie thomam Wod Duncanum
colisone patricium rede henricium rede Willelmum Kintor gavinum murray ma
theum branche et Andream stevinsone burgenses dicti burgj Quj juratj dicunt
quod quondam Annabella Kintor Auia Agnetis ruthirfurd' latricis presencium obijt
vltimo vestita et sasita vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de tercia parte vnius crofti Jacente ex boreali parte vicj regij quo Itur ad mo
lendina Justiciarij inter croftum Johannis cullane ex orientali ex vna et croftum
Alexandri rede ex occidentali partibus ab altera et croftum Alexandri mar vsque
boream Et communionem viam regiam vsque austrum Et quod dicta Agnes est vna de
legittimus et propinquioribus heredibus dicte quondam Annabelle Auie sue de tercia
parte dicti croftj cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta tercia pars crofti
valet nunc per annuum xviij solidos Et valuit decim solidos tempore pacis
Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis legittime et per se ipsum per decessum dicti
quondam Annabelle per spacium octodecim Annorum aut eocirca in defectum virj heredis
hucusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis

The said day Elizibetht Waus grantit hit awand' tile thomas louthouaris
vj s' for ane pot laid' in wede be the said Elizibeth' to the said thomas
quhilkis the balyeis chargit hir to pay within terme of lawe And' atour' the
aldirman and' bailyeis chargit Androw grig to caus' his wif to compere one
friday that nixt cumis to releif the sid Elizibetht skathtles' of the said' pot

The said' day Androw Dunbulge was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for the forstalling of the burghe in
bying of hidis skinnis and for regrating et cetera for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament for the courtis
and was extentit to x s' for the said' vnlavis

The said' day Androw portar was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Alexander gray forspekar for the forstalling
of the burghe in bying of hidis wole skinnis and for Regrating for the quhilkis he was in
amerciamentis of the Courtis and tile amende as law wile

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Johne litstar to Ansuer to ye
borghe fundin one him be thomas buchan that quhar' he hed' ane barrele of flour' in ane
of his quhilk he bocht fra Johne andirsone and resauit it thar and put It one his merk
and promittit to deliuer it to him et cetera and aw to mak him compt and rekning of the said' barrele of
flour and wrangis that he dois it nocht et cetera Ande Dauid murray come Souerte to Entir' the saide
Jonhne the said day be his hand' et cetera and to ansuer to the said' borghe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The said' day Jonhne Cuk officiar' at commavnde of the prouest and balyeis
chargit and commandit Duncan smitht be his wande of office to reman
within the tolbutht quhile he deliuerit to ser Jonhne stirueling his
ald' chartiris of his lande that vmquhile was Duncane talyouris eftir
the tenor of the actis maid' tharapone be his avne toung gravnt
penes fui tempore confectionis precedentis actorum et
sic erat admissum per prepositum et balliuos
teste manu propria
Johannes marschell
notarius publicus

The said' day Richerd' bernis denyit iiijor s' of maile follouit aving
to the wif of Donald' Srathachin and tuk to preiwe hir' pait one
monunday that next Cumis

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Mathoue branche fforspekar
that androue grig in his wiffis Name sale releif besse Waus of vj s' at the
handis of thomas bichas And' that the said androue aucht to pay the said vj s'
to the said thomas quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said' day the borghe' fundin one Johne litstar be thomas buchan for the wrang
uis' withhaldin fra him of ane barrele of ane barrele of flour' was fundin avail'
be ane Suorne assis' Androw Cullane forspekar for the quhilkis the said' Johne was
in amerciament of the court and to awche to pay the said' barrele of flour' et cetera

The saide day Jonhne andirsone was in amerciamentis of the courtis be his avne tounge
graunt for the forstalling of the burghe in bying of wole hidis skinnis and for Re
grating et cetera

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest balyeis counsale and communite present for the
tyme that euere fyrhous' within this burghe sale furnis' and Sende ane Sufficient werk
seruand' with spaide schivile or barrowe to help to Rede the commone loche quhen euire thai
be warnit tharto be the officiaris or the hande bele vndir the pane of viij s' vnforgevin

The said' day the court wardit schewe for lawe and It was gevin for dome that Symon
ellone hed' preuit Sufficientlie as efferis that the Sacc' of wole of his castin in
the sey out of ane Schip callit the barge of Abirdene optenit one patry rede mathoue
branche and Jonhne Craik contenit four' scoire stanys of wole

The said' day Dauid Andirsone and patry leslie at the request of gilbert menyeis prouest lent
four' pundis vsuale money of Scotlande Ilkan of thame xl s' gevin to Johne fyndour' wricht
bigar' of the kirk werk and Stallis to the making of the next generale assedacioun' Ande
gif the commissaris of the toune for that tyme happinnis to promoiwe thame tile ony takis
corespondeing to the valour of the saide money it salbe allouit in thar girssome Ande
gif thai do nocht the saide prouest ballieis Counsale and communite grauntit to pay the saide
money agan to thame thar' ayris executoris or assignez eftir the making of the saide generale
assedacioun' but ony langir delay et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus Skynner conuictus fuit per assisam Jurata, ex ore Duncanj fyf prelocutoris eiusdem
pro perturbio Andree bavne cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The said' day Alexander gray forspekar for Symon' ellone protestit for Costis Skathtis and
expensis maid' and Sustenit be him in the presence of his serplat' and Sacc of wole
Castin in the sey be Jonhne craik patry rede mathoue branche and vthiris thar complicis
and recouerit of thame as in the actis maid tharapone mair' fullelie Is contenit et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die mensis aprilis
anno quo supra

The said' day Williame Dougles accusit for forstalling of the burgh et cetera for the
quhilkis he was ordanit to pay v s' to the denis of the gilde

add.foreign: Johannes murray plegius pro Willelmo Rob

div.p:
The said' day Jonhne of murray come Souerte be his hande tile Entir William
Rob befor the prouest balyeis and denys of gild' at the next hed' court within
the tolbutht thar tile vndirlie the law for forstalling of this burghe et cetera or
ellis tile ansuer' for him the said' day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xj die mensis aprilis Anno
quo supra

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit the law day next eftir pasche hereftir
follouing to patry Rede tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Dauid futhes
that he awche to releiwe him of his part of ane Sacc of wole castin out
of the barge of Abirdene pertening to Symone Ellone becaus' at the castin of the samyn
he promittit to pay the samyn and in the feir' et cetera

The said' day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome that Richerd'
bernys hed' falyeit in his preiwe anent iiijor s' allegit pait be him to the spous'
of Donalde Srathauchin for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and awe to
pay the said' iiijor s'

The saide day James Williamsone was in Amerciament of the court be his avne toung graunt
for the forstalling of the burghe in bying of Skinnis

The said' day Duncane Smytht lauchfullie callit and nocht Comperit was in Amerciament of the
court in defalt of presence as he that was oblist to the provest and balyeis to haue
Comperit and brocht with him the ald' chartiris and evidencis of the lande of Duncan
talyouris
